title: Custom Challenge: Hash Table, String, Design
description:
Given the candidate's expertise in Hash Table, String, Design, design an efficient solution that processes the input data.

Based on their recent problems: Design Log Storage System, Design In-Memory File System, LRU Cache.

Write a function that takes an array of integers and returns the optimal result using concepts from: Hash Table, String, Design.
hints: Think about how Hash Table can help optimize the solution.
Consider edge cases with empty or single-element inputs.
